name: January 2023 Release Hotfix 1 (version 1.41.1)
body:
## Version 1.41.1
* Release date: January 30, 2023
* Release status: GA
 
### Bugs fixed in 1.41.1
| New Item | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Connection | Fixed a bug causing incorrect Azure account tenant selection when connecting to server through the Azure view. https://github.com/microsoft/azuredatastudio/issues/21643 |
| Object Explorer | Fixed a regression which caused Object Explorer to not show database objects for Azure SQL DB Basic SLO. https://github.com/microsoft/azuredatastudio/issues/21735 |

|Platform |Type             |Download |
| --------|-----------------|----------------------- |
|Windows  |User Installer   |[64 bit][win-user] [ARM][win-user-arm64] |
|         |System Installer |[64 bit][win-system] [ARM][win-system-arm64] |
|         |.zip             |[64 bit][win-zip] [ARM][win-zip-arm64] |
|Linux    |.tar.gz          |[64 bit][linux-zip] |
|         |.deb             |[64 bit][linux-deb] |
|         |.rpm             |[64 bit][linux-rpm] |
|Mac      |.zip             |[Universal][osx-universal] [Intel Chip][osx-zip] [Apple Silicon][osx-arm64] |
